Description: Flaring ring foot and wall sherd of black-glazed pottery dish (?); fine light beige clay; wholly glazed save stand-ring; inscription cut on underside.
Curator's comments: Shape and origin uncertain; much seems Lakonian, but the shape a puzzle.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 584)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1773)
